Uses of Package
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context

  • Packages that use com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context 
    Package Description
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context
    Provides the classes necessary for configuring Infinitum and providing application-wide access to configuration information.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the context framework.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the SQLite ORM framework.
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context 
    Class and Description
    BeanService
    Stores beans that have been configured in infinitum.cfg.xml.
    InfinitumContext
    Acts as a container for application-wide context information.
    InfinitumContext.ConfigurationMode
    Represents the entity persistence configuration mode.
    InfinitumContext.DataSource
    Represents the configured data source for a Session.
    RestfulConfiguration
    Container for RESTful web service configuration settings.
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context.impl 
    Class and Description
    BeanService
    Stores beans that have been configured in infinitum.cfg.xml.
    ContextService
    Provides access to an InfinitumContext singleton.
    InfinitumContext
    Acts as a container for application-wide context information.
    InfinitumContext.ConfigurationMode
    Represents the entity persistence configuration mode.
    InfinitumContext.DataSource
    Represents the configured data source for a Session.
    RestfulConfiguration
    Container for RESTful web service configuration settings.
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.impl 
    Class and Description
    InfinitumContext
    Acts as a container for application-wide context information.
